sentences.en: Because, although the manufacturing sector raised alarm, but there still financial hegemony.
sentences.cn: 因为, 虽然制造业亮起红灯, 但金融霸权仍然存在.

sentences.en: China opposes hegemonism, and China will never seek hegemony.
sentences.cn: 中国反对霸权主义, 中国永远不称霸.

sentences.en: China opposes hegemonism, and we shall never seek hegemony ourselves.
sentences.cn: 中国反对霸权主义, 自己也永远不称霸.

sentences.en: China will never seek hegemony and never go in for expansion.
sentences.cn: 中国永远不称霸,永远不搞扩张.

sentences.en: China will never seek hegemony, engage in expansion, not the arms race.
sentences.cn: 中国永远不称霸, 不搞扩张, 不搞军备竞赛.

sentences.en: China would never seek hegemony or expansionism, nor an arms race.
sentences.cn: 中国决不称霸或扩张, 也不搞军备竞赛.

sentences.en: Gold dollar empire, economical hegemony status already no longer.
sentences.cn: 金元帝国 、 经济霸权的地位早已不再.

sentences.en: Indeed, in every case tolerance was indispensable to the achievement of hegemony.
sentences.cn: 实际上, 在所有事例中,宽容是实现霸权不可或缺的因素.

sentences.en: It follows that opposing superpower hegemony means preserving world peace.
sentences.cn: 所以,反对超级大国的霸权主义也就是维护世界和平.

sentences.en: That could pose a serious threat to cellular hegemony.
sentences.cn: 此举可能严重威胁到移动电话的霸权.

sentences.en: The Beijing model in this context seems like a natural counterweight to America’s ideological hegemony.
sentences.cn: 在这样的背景下，北京模式似乎是美国意识形态霸权天然的抗衡力。

sentences.en: The Ousters eon - long mutated humanoids bent on overthrowing the Hegemony.
sentences.cn: 驱逐者:经过万年进化、决心推翻霸权的猿人.

sentences.en: To work for peace one must oppose hegemony and power politics.
sentences.cn: 要争取和平就必须反对霸权主义,反对强权政治.

sentences.en: We should struggle for human rights and oppose hegemony.
sentences.cn: 我们要争取人权,坚决反对威权主义.

sentences.en: We stand together in opposing expansionism and hegemony.
sentences.cn: 我们两国都反对扩张主义和霸权主义.

trans.tran_cn: 霸权，霸权主义，领导权，盟主权
trans.tran_en: a situation in which one state or country controls others
